name: Karma Chicken
description:
The path to enlightenment is a difficult one for every species. In Karma Chicken, sacrifice your unborn chicks to greedy farm animals for your own good!

Controls
ARROW keys to move.
Press and hold SPACE to lay an egg.

Credits
Concept, programming, graphics and design by Isabella Djurovic.
Music: Partita in A Minor by Johann Sebastian Bach and Scherzo No. 2 by Frederic Chopin via Internet Archive, licensed under CC BY 2.0.
